1.content:
The WWE took the plane to Tokyo for some rest, they won't know what happends when they get here.

Before we can contine on, which WWE Superstar should we follow?
1.title: The Start of the Story

choices: Rei-Chan seeing a vision of the future in the fire. (regular route)
All the Sailor Scounts including Luna and Artemis are talking (teammate route)
11.content:
Well well well, Mr. "Hustle Loyalty and Respect" huh? Excellent choice.

John Cena is settling into his hotel room when he hears a knock and a note is slid under the door. Cena picked up the note and it said "One of the WWE superstars has been taken over. Please come to this Temple ASAP." John Cena was running as fast as he could until he got close to the Temple when he saw his old enemy. "Well well well if it isn't Triple H." "What are you doing here?" "Oh nothing Cena just checking out this Temple here." Triple H was leaving when Cena saw that Triple H's eyes were red. "What was with Hunter's eyes?" "They were all red." When Cena came into the Temple he saw...


What did he see?
11.title: John Cena

choices: All the Girls was here (The Sailor Scouts [;)])
12.content:
Now your taking about 'The Game'!

Now when landing at Tokyo, Triple H grabs his bags and head to a hotel.

When morning comes, Hunter went to the door and found a letter saying

'To Triple H, if you read this letter, you know one of your superstars is being controled. If you want to know more, head to the temple, tell no one.'

"Who will be controled by who, maybe I should head to that temple to know more" said Hunter.

When heading to the temple, Hunter has met up with his opponent, Randy Orton.

"Well, well, well. If isn't my opponent, Triple H" said Orton. "What do you want Orton?" asked Hunter. "I'm just checking how my opponent is doing" Orton asked back, "Well I better be going..."

Then Orton left, leaving Hunter confused asking, "I don't know why Orton's eyes look weird"

When Hunter reach the temple...
12.title: Triple H

choices: THAT IS RIGHT I AM TRIPLE H HAIL ME!!(ingornt path)
Why did you call me?(normal path)
123.content: Triple H entered the temple and found a black haired girl in the room and ask himself who she was. The girl turn and said so you are the one who is called Triple H?(what should I say?)
123.title: Game meets Priesstess

choices: So my dear why have you called me here?
They are attacked by a crazed Kane!
Rei gets a call from serina saying the death busters were attacking!!!!
1232.content: And you are....said the game and he curtsied for her.(Back as Hunter Hearst Helmsley he had a gentle mans manners and accidentally let that side show.)She was taken aback by this not expecting Triple HHH to be this much of a gentlemen if any and said H..Hino...Hino Rei at your service kind sir.
1232.title: And you are?(girlfriend path)

The WWE went to Tokyo, but an adventure went to them when one of them is being controled.

WWE Superstars can swear, but not a lot, it's PG-13 to M-15
